scripts.copysrc: rm -rf exercises exercises-final/ && cp -r src/ exercises/ && cp -r src/ exercises-final/
scripts.gen1: rm -rf templates && mkdir -p templates/node && mkdir -p templates/stocks/src/app && cp src/node/{easy-as-123.js,sync-vs-async.js,switch.js,concat.js,isolation.js,cold-vs-hot.js,merge.js,array-methods.js,first-catch.js,my-first-subject.js,operators-basic.js,subject-observer.js,subject-unsubscribe.js} templates/node/ && cp -rf src/stocks/src/app/ templates/stocks/src/app/
scripts.generate: npm run gen1 && npm run gen2
